Ugaritic letter 𐎏 ḏ DHALta Δ D 𐤃 𓏏𓂧 D δ

δ ⋍ 𐎏 ⋍ σ ⋍ 𐎌 strong 's' 'z' 'c' tendencies:
C ⋍ 𐎏 ⋍ 𓐍 strong 'c' tendencies, just like 𓂧 :

𒌓𒉣𒇻 par-zil-lu 𐤁𐤓𐤆𐤋 brzl /barzel/ “iron” פַּרְזְלָא ܦܪܙܠܐ parzəlā 𐎁𐎗 𐎏 𐎍 brḏl ⇔ bronzeˡ

𐎏𐎗 «dr» circle 'dreh' ⇔ drum 🪘🛢🥁
𐎏𐎗 /δ-r/ "surround"

pure D:
𐎏𐎐 /d-n/ "judgment, case, sentence" DOOM,deem,deen,don 𐌳𐍉𐌼𐌾𐌰𐌽

⇔ 𐎘THA 𐎁 brD 𐎄blDT Bdt 𓉔 Beth 𐎊DVY! PT 𓉐 Dar/Weil 𐎃dHair dreh

𐎏 dent 𓏏 𓄑 𓎆 in 𓋴 𓐍 𓆼 𓄿 𓀁 "thinker" Denker 𐎏𐎋𐎗 ḏkr (as verb) 𐎏 C > S in 𒋛 SIʰʳ #sḫꜣj 𓋴 𓆼 𓄿 𓀁 זָכַר zakhár secure "remember" 𐎏𐎋𐎗 ḏkr ܕܵܟ݂ܹܪ daḳer @ digit 𒋛
